name: Sedan
description: A passenger car in a three-box configuration with separate compartments for engine, passenger, and cargo.

name: Hatchback
description: A car with a rear door that swings upward to provide access to a cargo area.

name: SUV
description: Sport Utility Vehicle, combines elements of road-going passenger cars with features from off-road vehicles.

name: Coupe
description: A car with a fixed-roof body style usually with two doors.

name: Convertible
description: A car with a roof structure that can be 'converted' to allow open-air or enclosed driving.

name: Wagon
description: A car with a full-height body all the way to the rear; the rear door or doors provide access to the cargo area.

name: Pickup Truck
description: A light-duty truck having an enclosed cab and an open cargo area with low sides and tailgate.

name: Minivan
description: A van designed primarily for personal use, with reconfigurable seats and sliding doors.

name: Crossover
description: A vehicle built on a car platform combining features of a SUV with features from a passenger vehicle.

name: Roadster
description: A two-seat car, traditionally an open-top sports car.
